languages.text: "Снег застил мне очи, и я мог различить лишь тень, но двигался он быстро и был силен. Если бы дар Всеотца не срастил ребра мои в крепкий панцирь, тот удар стал бы последним". {n}Волк произносит эти слова с замогильным равнодушием.{/n}

"The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Снег застил мне очи, и я мог различить лишь тень, но двигался он быстро и был силен. Если бы дар Всеотца не срастил ребра мои в крепкий панцирь, тот удар стал бы последним". {n}Волк произносит эти слова с замогильным равнодушием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}

"The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}

"The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}

languages.text: “暴风雪遮住了我的眼睛。我只看到了一个影子，但它的动作很快，也很强壮。若不是全父的恩赐，让我的肋骨变成了坚硬的甲壳，恐怕挨了那一击之后，我就没命了。”{n}乌尔法说出这些话的时候，神情冷漠得令人不寒而栗。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “暴风雪遮住了我的眼睛。我只看到了一个影子，但它的动作很快，也很强壮。若不是全父的恩赐，让我的肋骨变成了坚硬的甲壳，恐怕挨了那一击之后，我就没命了。”{n}乌尔法说出这些话的时候，神情冷漠得令人不寒而栗。{/n}

languages.text: 「雪が俺の目を覆い、俺は影をさばくのがやっとだった。だが、奴の動きが速くなり強さを増してきた。全知の父が俺のあばらを固くに編み上げてくださらなければ、あの一薙ぎが俺の最期になっていただろう」{n}狼は恐ろしいほど平然と言ってのける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「雪が俺の目を覆い、俺は影をさばくのがやっとだった。だが、奴の動きが速くなり強さを増してきた。全知の父が俺のあばらを固くに編み上げてくださらなければ、あの一薙ぎが俺の最期になっていただろう」{n}狼は恐ろしいほど平然と言ってのける。{/n}

languages.text: «La nieve cubrió mis ojos y solo pude distinguir una sombra. rápida y fuerte. Si el don del Padre de todas las cosas no hubiera convertido mi caja torácica en un caparazón firme, ese golpe habría acabado conmigo». {n}El Lobo habla con una despreocupación heladora.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La nieve cubrió mis ojos y solo pude distinguir una sombra. rápida y fuerte. Si el don del Padre de todas las cosas no hubiera convertido mi caja torácica en un caparazón firme, ese golpe habría acabado conmigo». {n}El Lobo habla con una despreocupación heladora.{/n}

languages.text: « Aveuglé par la neige, je ne pouvais distinguer qu'une ombre, mais elle était forte et se déplaçait rapidement. Si le don du Père de Tous n'avait pas transformé ma cage thoracique en robuste carapace, ce coup m'aurait été fatal, » {n}explique le Loup avec une nonchalance glaçante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Aveuglé par la neige, je ne pouvais distinguer qu'une ombre, mais elle était forte et se déplaçait rapidement. Si le don du Père de Tous n'avait pas transformé ma cage thoracique en robuste carapace, ce coup m'aurait été fatal, » {n}explique le Loup avec une nonchalance glaçante.{/n}

languages.text: "Der Schnee bedeckte meine Augen, und ich erkannte nur einen Schatten, aber er bewegte sich schnell und war stark. Hätte der Griff des Allvaters meine Rippen nicht zu einem harten Panzer verdichtet, wäre dieser Schlag mein letzter gewesen." {n}Der Wolf äußert diese Sichtweise mit einer unheimlich wirkenden Gleichgültigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Schnee bedeckte meine Augen, und ich erkannte nur einen Schatten, aber er bewegte sich schnell und war stark. Hätte der Griff des Allvaters meine Rippen nicht zu einem harten Panzer verdichtet, wäre dieser Schlag mein letzter gewesen." {n}Der Wolf äußert diese Sichtweise mit einer unheimlich wirkenden Gleichgültigkeit.{/n}

languages.text: "Kar gözlerimi kapattı, sadece bir gölge görebiliyordum. Çok hızlı hareket ediyordu ve çok güçlüydü. Yücebaba'nın hediyesi kaburgalarımı sert bir kabukzırha döndürmeseydi o vuruş sonumu getirebilirdi." {n}Kurt, bu sözleri soğukkanlı bir umursamazlıkla söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The snow covered my eyes and I could only make out a shadow, but it moved fast and it was strong. If the Allfather's gift had not knitted my ribs into a hard carapace, that blow would have been my last." {n}The Wolf says these words with chilling nonchalance.{/n}
